title: How to study for the 10th Tamil Nadu boards - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey I gave my 10TH boards . So I can understand what difficulty you might face in 10th boards. First of all everyone will tell you refer this book that book .But trust me first of clear your self with Text book .But you need to first clear your basic . Now here are some super tips: Regular practice is must. You should study right from the beginning.Avoid studying a single subject for days.and ignoring others.You should be in touch with each and every subject daily.For language you can use weekendsAllot proper time for each and every subject.Study each subject for 2 hoursPractice 20 maths sums daily without fail even on weekendsTry to complete your syllabus till December or maximum JanuaryAnd then use the last two months for practising last year papersTo gain confidence it's damn important to solve last ten years papers.Don't worry 10th boards is the easiest exam of your life….mark my words you'll feel that I'm kidding or I'm mad but trust me you will realize it later.If you do all this, No one can stop you from achieving Great heights of success. Best of luck:)
